intro: This course was developed especially for the Customer Service team, with the objective of strengthening knowledge, aligning practices and continuously improving the quality of service offered to customers on a daily basis.
img_alt: Young smiling consultant talking on headset

sabia.title: Did You Know?
sabia.text: Studies show that 86% of consumers are willing to pay more for a better service experience!
sabia.source: Source: RightNow Customer Experience Impact Report (Oracle, 2012)

learning_path: Throughout the course, you will better understand:

c1.title: How Customer Service works
c1.text: Understand the structure, service channels and team workflow.

c2.title: Strategic responsibilities
c2.text: Learn about the fundamental role you play in customer satisfaction and brand image.

c3.title: Impact on the customer
c3.text: Discover why every service provided has a direct impact on the customer experience.

a1.title: What will you learn in this module?
a1.l1: The strategic role of Customer Service within the company
a1.l4: How each interaction affects brand perception

a2.title: Why is this training important?
a2.text: Excellent service not only resolves demands: it builds trust, strengthens bonds and directly contributes to customer loyalty.

reflexao.title: Stop and Think
reflexao.text: Before moving on, reflect: When a customer contacts Customer Service, what do you believe they expect to find beyond solving the problem?

reveal.title: The customer usually expects:
reveal.l1: To be heard with attention and empathy
reveal.l2: To receive fast and efficient service
reveal.l3: To feel that the company cares about them
reveal.l4: To have clarity about the next steps
reveal.l5: To leave satisfied, even when the answer is not ideal
